posts.post_content:
I have the following SGC graded T205's for sale.  Accept Paypal, check or money orders.  Price includes shipping.  

SGC - 30:  Beals Becker  - $23.00
SGC - 20:  Otis Crandall ("T" crossed)  - $20.00 (Polar Bear)
SOLD------SGC - 10:  George Suggs  -  $36.00 - (paper loss on back 4 corners which includes first 2 lines of text)
SOLD------SGC - "A"   John Rowan -   $30.00 (Piedmont 42)

I currently don't have a picture of Crandall, but can upon request.  It is a fair representative of its grade with several creases but no paper loss.

$100.00 for all or possible trade for T205's that I need.
